post.text: Donald Trump spent five years lying about President Obama's citizenship. He can't just take that back.

comment.author: Kristie
comment.text: Millions did because of his stechy childhood his father was Kenyan and his family is and lives in Kenya so the questions are out there . Hillary you called millions of us deplorable. This is typical of elitist out of touch people like you.

replies.author: Gaige
replies.text: Well, technically, not if it's true
